name: Tiny Planet, Big Universe
description:
Tiny Planet, Big Universe is a side scrolling space shmup. You play as a tiny planet, trying to not get run over by aliens and natural phenomena!

This is the first game we've made together before, and neither of us have used Unity prior to this event, so I'd like to think that this is a pretty solid submission for both making the game and learning Unity's various nuances.

Attached is a Windows desktop version download and a Mac desktop version download.

Ludumdare 38 Game submission link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/tiny-planet...

Bugs:

  • Quit buttons don't do anything in browser. Sorry guys!
